name: Egg-celent Omlettes
description:
Have you ever wanted to become a chicken?

Have you, per chance, ever wanted to become a chicken that can also cook?

Then look no further!

In this game, you can become a chicken and collect eggs from your chicken friends to cook a variety of omlettes which are then served to human customers! 

'Welcome Yolks…I mean folks and prepare to shelleibrate and have a cracking good time with Eggcellent omeltte. Try our (Extremely) locally source eggs, fresh out the nest and whipped up into a frenzy of different recipes from around the world. Pull up a seat and leave the neggetivity at the door.'

Features:

- Omlettes based on delicacies from around the globe!

- Outfits for the chickens!

- Did I mention you can literally play as a chef chicken?

- This game was made as part of a 48 hour game jam and as a result is not as polished as it could be. -
